Treasure Earring (Obsidian, Left Ear, Women)
Boucle d'oreille trésor (obsidienne, oreille gauche, femme)
Ohrring aus einem Schatz (Obsidian, linkes Ohr, Damen)
Orecchino prezioso (ossidiana, orecchio sinistro, uomo)

Treasure Earring (Obsidian, Left Ear, Women)
寶物耳環（黑曜石/左耳/女用)
寶物耳環（黑曜石/左耳/女用)
Treasure Earring (Obsidian, Left Ear, Women)
kDesc
This black gem is volcanic stone that has been worked to give it a glassy sheen. For the left ear. (Mohs hardness: 5)[#Legal]
Cette pierre noire est un morceau de roche volcanique qui a été poli pour lui donner la brillance du verre. Pour l'oreille gauche. (Échelle de Mohs : 5)[#Legal]
Dieser schwarze Edelstein besteht aus Vulkangestein, dem durch Behandlung ein glasiger Schimmer verliehen worden ist. Für das linke Ohr. (Mohssche Härte: 5) [#Legal]
Una gemma vulcanica nera, lavorata fino a risplendere. Orecchio sinistro. (Durezza in scala Mohs: 5)[#Legal]
Esta gema negra es una piedra volcánica, pulida para que brille. Para la oreja derecha. (Dureza en la escala de Mohs: 5) [#Legal]
火山岩を加工したガラス質でできた黒い宝石。左耳用。（モース硬度５）[#Legal]
화산암을 가공해 유리와 같은 재질로 만든 검은 보석. 왼쪽 귀 전용.(모스 경도5)[#Legal]
This black gem is volcanic stone that has been worked to give it a glassy sheen. For the left ear. (Mohs hardness: 5)[#Legal]
這種黑色、玻璃質的寶石是利用火山岩加工製成的。供左耳用。（摩斯硬度5）[#Legal]
這種黑色、玻璃質的寶石是利用火山岩加工製成的。供左耳用。（摩斯硬度5）[#Legal]
This black gem is volcanic stone that has been worked to give it a glassy sheen. For the left ear. (Mohs hardness: 5)[#Legal]
